website_summaries.verdict: Open up this magical music box and the unicorn turns to the theme of 'Somewhere Over The Rainbow.
pros: A cute box with nice decoration
Stands out for its ample space inside for trinkets
Features a small mirror, a dancing unicorn, and (of course) the sound of 'Somewhere Over the Rainbow.'
Arrives in a Jewelkeeper gift box, which is a nice touch
cons: The end of the crank is removable and could pose a choking hazard for small children

customer_reviews.title: Cute music box for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: Cute little music box. Horse does appear to be delicate and I notice a slight crack in the mane but this is for a four year girl and I'm sure she won't notice it. Given four stars before but Amazon wouldn't let me post my original review.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic childs first jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my Goddaughter's fifth birthday... she wanted something with rainbows and unicorns, and "Somewhere Over the Rainbow" is one of her favorite tunes. She absolutely loves it. The tune was immediately recognizable and the product seems well crafted, even though it's made of fiberboard covered with paper. I suspect this will be one of the gifts she treasures for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Duane A. Priest

customer_reviews.title: Music winder does not work within a month of purchase
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is darling. It seems to be constructed as you would expect for sturdiness. My daughter received this for her 4th bday in June and about a month later the turny thing to play the music does not work. When you turn it it sounds like it should but it doesn't do whatever it does to wind up the music so the unicorn doesnt turn nor does the music play. It's a shame but what do you do??
customer_reviews.author: M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cute box but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The box is cute - much smaller than I expected, but that is on me because I did not even consider looking at the measurements. The inside is cardboard lined with a flocked material. The music is nice and the unicorn does turn like the ballerinas "in the olden days" in little girl jewelry boxes. I purchased this for my Granddaughter's 5th birthday, but I doubt it will last very long. Next time I will get something bigger and made of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Very cute jewelry box, a perfect first box for a little girl. I had a ballerina one when I was little, so it was also nostalgic to be able to give my daughter one that was similar but unicorn themed. The music works and is pretty, Unicorn spins and so far has fared well being toted around by a five year old. Would make a good Christmas or Birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: It is cute.
customer_reviews.text: This box is nothing fancy. BUT it is perfect for what I was looking for, for our toddler. It’s small, it won’t be a big a big deal if it drops, and it plays music and holds jewelry. It is perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: BookTea

customer_reviews.title: Hit add to cart!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my little girl that is 3 and stuff like this is always iffy with the little ones because of quality how long it will actually hold up and I was very shocked after receiving it was made better then I had original thought and it's still holding which if you knew my children it's a miracle and she loves it if you think your kid would like this kind of gift dont hesitate on this one it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Obvious superficial flaws. Box doesn’t even line up correctly. Music feature doesn’t work. This was supposed to be a gift. Please don’t waste your time and money. Immediately returning.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter and she loves it she’s three and it was sturdy enough to go through her throwing phase. It’s also nice that I can take the crank off so I don’t have to listen to the song forever.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item to keep
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loves it even when the unicorn stopped spinning and play the music. She loves the box and is sad if don't play but refuses to put the box away. Wish they had a replacement policy but I have not found or seen it.
customer_reviews.author: CARL

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but not what i expected. Smaller than in the pics
customer_reviews.text: It looks different than in the pictures. It’s very small. The material doesn't look nice
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: The unicorn jewelry box is adorable. It’s colorful and the little twirling unicorn is very sweet. This is a birthday gift for my niece on her 7th birthday. She’s crazy about unicorns and she will love this box. It’s sturdier than I expected and seems quite well made. I bought some unicorn jewelry to go inside. Can’t wait to see my niece open it on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I do not have a pic as I put it away for my daughter's birthday present. I also bought 2 pairs of earrings on Amazon as well for my daughter to keep in here. Great quality. The spinning unicorn is adorable. It's going to be an amazing birthday gift and cannot wait to give it to her, she is going to love not only the jewelry box, but the earrings as well. Great job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle High

customer_reviews.title: ITS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter Normally gets tired of a new Toy or anything new within 3 days but for the Musical JEWELRY BOX, She has been on it everyday. she loves it and i will keep you guys update with the durability. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a darling jewelry box for a little girl!! My 4 yr old granddaughter loves unicorns so this is perfect. It’s sturdy but has a delicate little unicorn that spins inside. The music is sweet too. Perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Birdnerd

customer_reviews.title: this will bring a smile to a little one's face
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my 4 year old niece and she absolutely adored it !! I did not see this personally since I live in another state however the look on her face when she opened the gift and heard the music was priceless. I am grateful that during these difficult times we can count on gifts arriving on time and bring joy to the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Jan

customer_reviews.title: unicorn music box
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is a Unicorn theme however it was not worth the price looks cheap and the box that it came in looked like it had been around since the 70's old and torn. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece as a gift and I absolutely love it. It's a good tune and sound. The unicorn inside is a good size and all the parts work as expected. This is just like the jewelry boxes I remember getting when I was a child. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Grand-daughters.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sweet jewelry boxes for 2 of my 3-year-old Unicorn and jewelry loving grandchildren for Christmas. They have not opened them yet but I have little doubt they will not love them. For the price they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Garrett

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful first jeweler box for my Great Grandaughter.
customer_reviews.text: When she first received it her eyes were wide with excitement that she received a package by ups and then her mother put it together (Just unwrap unicorn and place on spindle.) Her mom wound it up and there she was looking and singing and of course when her two brothers came to see. She let them know this was her grown up jewelry Box. After awhile she let them see it and they all loved it. All 3 and under, a great gift. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Susane R.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for girls
customer_reviews.text: A low price item but little girls love it. Bought it as a gift for my niece for her birthday and the other girls just keep starting at it and listen to it's music. It'll be a great gift for little girls.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter for Christmas. I opened it up and it brought back so many good memories of my childhood. I hope she enjoys it as much as I enjoyed mine as a child.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. My 6 year old loves this. It is big enough to fit her little jewelry in, but small enough to carry around. Seems fairly well-made. Probably won't last for years and years to come with regular use, but it is definitely worth the price. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: GarrettJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 5 Year old Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this little jewelry box. The unicorn turns and the music is sweet. She can easily wind it and loves to hear it. She has room to store all her necklaces and bracelets in it so they won't get lost. It's very lightweight and sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn lovers dream jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any unicorn loving little girl. Made a lovely birthday present. Plays Noah don’t forget those unicorns. My 4 year old was a bit rough on it, probably better suited for a bit older of a child. It’s very cute. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: orangedaisys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old granddaughter loved it. It was perfect for her. And the music played well made for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: The jewelry box arrived without any outside packing. The address label was actually stuck on the jewelry box. I had to peel it off so I could give it as a gift. The box then had a sticky residue on the actual box, so I couldn’t give it or use it that way. I finally found a glue off product that took the glue residue off the box. The box was not study and looked very cheap. I don’t recommend buying it from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay

customer_reviews.title: This little girl will love it.
customer_reviews.text: We are working with Catholic Social Services to adopt a family for Christmas. All I know about this little girl is she loves Unicorns. I suspect this will be a thrill for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive box. This is a Christmas present for my granddaughter. She is going to live it.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Algier

customer_reviews.title: If you love Unicorns
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I have a friend who LOVES Unicorns, and I'm sure (even though she's an adult) she's going to love it as a Christmas gift. It's very well made, and pretty, and the music box works wonderfully. Hmmm ... maybe I should get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Bought as Christmas gift for my granddaughter who picked it out herself on Amazon. Note the size. It is small. Nice gift for a pre-school girl.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Great little girl gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter loved this gift!! It is sturdy and she loves the music!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This little jewelry box is a adorable. My daughter loves the little mirror in the box and the music it plays.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena henry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: This was not misrepresented in the photo but I was disappointed with the quality and will not use as a gift. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: Cute little jewelry/music box for a young girl. Our granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Little girl loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The horse is on a spring so it doesnt get broken off. But the cardboard box and plastic mirror wont last as long.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty music box
customer_reviews.text: The music box was smaller than I thought, otherwise, exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Esther Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriately shipped
customer_reviews.text: Music box came with zero shipping box/shipping bag. Shipping sticker was attached directly to the music box's box. I did not find this Ok whatsoever. I wanted to wrap the box, and now it has an ugly sticker attached, not to mention that there was zero concern for the shipping process. Music box itself is cute, though I'm not sure how long it will last. For the price it is Fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Memories for a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Shag greater gift than a jewelry box to hold all of the sweet pieces of jewelry they get along the way! This box is so cute and simply sweet.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: Lorah C.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute jewlery box. My granddaughter has myscular dystophy and can't hold things that are too heavy. This is a well made corragated box that made it lighter weight. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Alana

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the twirling unicorn and the music. The Irish Rovers sing The Unicorn Song on YouTube, if you would like to hear the melody.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mark P

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but the unicorn was bent when it came out of the box. It still isn't straight but my daughter loves it

product_meta.title: Jewelkeeper Girl's Musical Jewelry Storage Box with Spinning Unicorn, Rainbow Design, The Unicorn Tune
feature_bullets: ⭐STORE PRECIOUS TREASURES: Our unicorn music box makes it easy to organize little girls jewelry. Plenty of space for girls necklaces, bracelets, earrings, and other keepsakes. Not only will it help keep messy rooms organized, it also has a smooth, soft pink lining, which can help prevent your child’s trinkets from getting scratched.

⭐CREATE MEMORABLE MOMENTS: Imagine her reaction when she opens her unicorn musical box to see a magical unicorn doll spin to THE UNICORN TUNE for the first time. Wrapped in a gift box, our jewelry box is the ideal birthday or Christmas gift for girls. Sure to put a smile on your child’s face, it’ll be a nostalgic memory kids will remember well into adulthood.

⭐SPARK THE IMAGINATION: All of our gifts and toys are thoughtfully created with children in mind. Our unique, timeless watercolor designs will inspire creativity and fill children with happiness. Jewelkeeper music boxes make for magical gifts and are sure to compliment any unicorn decor and sit beautifully among the growing collection of unicorn toys and girl stuff in their room!

⭐QUALITY PARENTS CAN TRUST: Crafted with durable pine fiberboard material and a stylish silver-tone latch, our kids jewelry box is heavy and durable – so your gift is guaranteed to last! Rigorously tested for safety, each girls jewelry box meets CPSIA, ASTM and EN71 guidelines, ensuring your little ones are safe and in good hands.

⭐RISK FREE SHOPPING: Available in over 500 retail stores across the United States, shoppers just can’t get enough of Jewelkeeper musical jewelry boxes! Backed by our top-notch customer service and best all around value. Music Box measures: 6 x 4.65 x 3.5 inches (L x W x H) when closed.
